for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, D) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = sum(arr)
    if total % len(arr) != 0:
        print(-1)
    else:
        div = total // len(arr)
        j = 0
        count = 0
        while j + D < len(arr):
            if arr[j] < div:
                diff = div - arr[j]
                count += diff
                arr[j] += diff
                arr[j + D] -= diff
            elif arr[j] > div:
                diff = arr[j] - div
                count += diff
                arr[j] -= diff
                arr[j + D] += diff
            j += 1
        while j < len(arr):
            if arr[j] != div:
                count = -1
                break
            j += 1
        print(count)

from math import sqrt
import sys
t = int(input())
while t:
    flag = 0
    (n, d) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    diff = 0
    avg = sum(arr)
    x = avg // n
    for i in range(0, n - d):
        j = i + d
        if arr[i] < x:
            diff = x - arr[i]
            arr[i] = x
            arr[j] -= diff
            c += diff
        elif arr[i] > x:
            diff = arr[i] - x
            arr[j] += diff
            arr[i] = x
            c += diff
    if len(set(arr)) == 1:
        print(c)
    else:
        print(-1)
    t = t - 1

import math
import statistics
for t in range(int(input())):
    (n, d) = map(int, input('').split())
    a = list(map(int, input('').split()))
    count = 0
    i = 0
    mn = statistics.mean(a)
    if math.floor(mn) != math.ceil(mn):
        print(-1)
        continue
    else:
        while count < n - d:
            difference = abs(a[count] - mn)
            if a[count] < mn:
                a[count + d] -= difference
                a[count] += difference
                i += difference
            else:
                a[count] -= difference
                a[count + d] += difference
                i += difference
            count += 1
        if len(set(a)) == 1:
            print(i)
        else:
            print(-1)

import math
import statistics
N = int(input())
for m in range(N):
    (temp, newOne) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    mn = statistics.mean(l)
    i = 0
    if math.floor(mn) != math.ceil(mn):
        print(-1)
        continue
    else:
        z = 0
        while z < temp - newOne:
            difference = abs(l[z] - mn)
            if l[z] > mn:
                l[z] -= difference
                l[z + newOne] += difference
                i += difference
            else:
                l[z] += difference
                l[z + newOne] -= difference
                i += difference
            z += 1
        if len(set(l)) == 1:
            print(i)
        else:
            print(-1)

import math
import statistics
N = int(input())
for m in range(N):
    (x, d) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    data = statistics.mean(l)
    i = 0
    if math.floor(data) != math.ceil(data):
        print(-1)
        continue
    else:
        z = 0
        while z < x - d:
            difference = abs(l[z] - data)
            if l[z] > data:
                l[z] -= difference
                l[z + d] += difference
                i += difference
            else:
                l[z] += difference
                l[z + d] -= difference
                i += difference
            z += 1
        if len(set(l)) == 1:
            print(i)
        else:
            print(-1)

from math import *

def fonction(tab, taille, mover):
    moy = sum(tab)
    if moy % taille != 0:
        return -1
    moy //= taille
    OP = 0
    Mat = []
    defaut = []
    dispo = []
    somme = [0] * mover
    for i in range(mover):
        tmp = []
        tmp_def = []
        tmp_disp = []
        for j in range(i, taille, mover):
            tmp.append(tab[j])
            somme[i] += tab[j]
            if tab[j] > moy:
                tmp_disp.append([tab[j] - moy, j // mover])
            elif tab[j] < moy:
                tmp_def.append([moy - tab[j], j // mover])
        if moy * ((taille - i - 1) // mover + 1) != somme[i]:
            return -1
        defaut.append(tmp_def)
        dispo.append(tmp_disp)
        Mat.append(tmp)
    for i in range(mover):
        ind_disp = 0
        for j in range(len(defaut[i])):
            k = ind_disp
            while defaut[i][j][0] > 0:
                t = min(defaut[i][j][0], dispo[i][k][0])
                defaut[i][j][0] -= t
                dispo[i][k][0] -= t
                if dispo[i][k][0] == 0:
                    ind_disp = k + 1
                OP += t * fabs(defaut[i][j][1] - dispo[i][k][1])
                k += 1
    return int(OP)
N = int(input())
for a in range(N):
    (taille, d) = (int(i) for i in input().split())
    tab = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    print(fonction(tab, taille, d))

test = int(input())
for z in range(test):
    counter = 0
    (N, D) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    arr = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    l = len(arr)
    mean = 0
    num = 0
    for i in range(D):
        new_arr = [arr[j] for j in range(i, l, D)]
        s = sum(new_arr)
        leng = len(new_arr)
        if s % leng != 0:
            t = 0
            print('-1')
            break
        else:
            m = s // leng
            if i == 0:
                mean = m
            elif m != mean:
                t = 0
                print('-1')
                break
            for j in range(leng - 1):
                if new_arr[j] != mean:
                    counter += abs(mean - new_arr[j])
                    new_arr[j + 1] -= mean - new_arr[j]
                    new_arr[j] = mean
                t = 1
    if t == 1:
        print(counter)

from collections import Counter
from functools import reduce
t = int(input())
while t:
    flag = 1
    (n, d) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    p = reduce(lambda x, y: x + y, l)
    p = p // n
    for i in range(0, d):
        j = i
        while j + d < n:
            if l[j] > p:
                l[j + d] += l[j] - p
                ans += l[j] - p
                l[j] = p
            elif l[j] < p:
                l[j + d] -= p - l[j]
                ans += p - l[j]
                l[j] = p
            j += d
    p = Counter(l)
    if len(p) > 1:
        flag = 0
    if flag == 1:
        print(ans)
    else:
        print('-1')
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
i = 0
while i < t:
    (n, m) = input().strip().split(' ')
    n = int(n)
    m = int(m)
    li = [int(x) for x in input().strip().split(' ')]
    s = sum(li)
    val = int(s / n)
    if s % n == 0:
        count = 0
        j = 0
        while j + m < n:
            li[j + m] += li[j] - val
            count += abs(li[j] - val)
            j += 1
        while j < n:
            if li[j] != val:
                break
            j += 1
        if j < n:
            print(-1)
        else:
            print(count)
    else:
        print(-1)
    i += 1

t = int(input())
for test in range(t):
    (n, d) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    suma = sum(a)
    if suma % n != 0:
        print(-1)
    else:
        final = suma // n
        moves = 0
        ptr1 = 0
        ptr2 = ptr1 + d
        while ptr1 < n and ptr2 < n:
            reqMoves = final - a[ptr1]
            a[ptr2] -= reqMoves
            moves += abs(reqMoves)
            ptr1 += 1
            ptr2 += 1
        while ptr1 < n:
            if a[ptr1] != final:
                moves = -1
                break
            ptr1 += 1
        print(moves)

def solve(A, N, D):
    S = sum(A)
    if S % N != 0:
        return -1
    a_target = S // N
    count = 0
    i = 0
    i_max = N - D
    while i < i_max:
        diff = A[i] - a_target
        A[i + D] += diff
        count += abs(diff)
        i += 1
    while i < N:
        if A[i] != a_target:
            return -1
        i += 1
    return count
T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    (N, D) = (int(i) for i in input().split())
    A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    print(solve(A, N, D))

t = int(input())
lis2 = list()
for i in range(t):
    f = 0
    moves = 0
    (n, d) = map(int, input().split())
    lis = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if sum(lis) % n != 0:
        print('-1')
    else:
        a = sum(lis) // n
        for j in range(0, d, 1):
            s = 0
            p = 0
            lis2[:] = []
            if f == 0:
                for k in range(j, n, d):
                    s = s + lis[k]
                    p = p + 1
                    lis2.append(lis[k])
                if s // p != a:
                    print('-1')
                    f = 1
                    break
                else:
                    st = 0
                    for l in range(len(lis2) - 1):
                        b = a - lis2[l]
                        lis2[l] = lis2[l] + b
                        lis2[l + 1] = lis2[l + 1] - b
                        st = st + abs(b)
                    moves = moves + st
        if f == 0:
            print(moves)
    lis[:] = []

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, D) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(arr)
    avg = s // N
    steps = 0
    for i in range(N):
        if i + D < N:
            t = arr[i] - avg
            arr[i] = avg
            arr[i + D] += t
            steps += abs(t)
        elif arr[i] != avg:
            print(-1)
            break
    else:
        print(steps)

for i in range(int(input())):
    sol = 0
    nd = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ai = list(map(int, input().split()))
    d = nd[1]
    if sol == -1:
        break
    for j in range(d):
        arr = ai[j::d]
        moy = sum(arr) / len(arr)
        if moy % 1 != 0:
            sol = -1
            break
        cpt = 0
        for l in range(len(arr) - 1):
            ecart = abs(moy - arr[l])
            if arr[l] < moy:
                cpt += ecart
                arr[l] += ecart
                arr[l + 1] -= ecart
            elif arr[l] > moy:
                cpt += ecart
                arr[l] -= ecart
                arr[l + 1] += ecart
        sol += cpt
    print(int(sol))

t = int(input().strip())
for a0 in range(t):
    (n, d) = input().strip().split()
    (n, d) = (int(n), int(d))
    a = [int(_) for _ in input().strip().split()]
    s = sum(a)
    if s % n != 0:
        print('-1')
        continue
    unit = s // n
    flag = 1
    ans = 0
    for i in range(d):
        j = i
        var = 0
        count = 0
        carry = 0
        while j < n:
            var += a[j]
            count += 1
            carry += a[j] - unit
            ans += abs(carry)
            j += d
        if var % count != 0 or var // count != unit:
            flag = 0
            break
    if flag == 0:
        print('-1')
    else:
        print(ans)

sakura = int(input())
for sasuke in range(sakura):
    (kakashi, sharingan) = map(int, input().split())
    naruto = list(map(int, input().split()))
    hinata = sum(naruto)
    if hinata % kakashi != 0:
        print(-1)
        continue
    konohamaru = hinata / kakashi
    shikamaru = True
    hokage = 0
    for iruka in range(sharingan):
        orochimaru = 0
        rocklee = naruto[iruka:kakashi:sharingan]
        ino = sum(rocklee)
        choji = len(rocklee)
        if ino / choji != konohamaru:
            shikamaru = False
            break
        for gaara in rocklee[0:choji - 1]:
            orochimaru += gaara - konohamaru
            hokage += abs(orochimaru)
        if rocklee[choji - 1] + orochimaru != konohamaru:
            shikamaru = False
            break
    if not shikamaru:
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(int(hokage))

t = int(input())
min_val = 1
while t:
    (n, m) = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    values = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    sum_val = sum(values)
    moves = 0
    if sum_val % n != 0:
        print(-1)
        t -= 1
        continue
    avg_val = int(sum_val / n)
    for i in range(n):
        if values[i] != avg_val:
            diff = values[i] - avg_val
            if i + m < n:
                values[i + m] += diff
                moves += abs(diff)
            elif values[i] != avg_val:
                print(-1)
                break
        if i == n - 1 and values[i] == avg_val:
            print(moves)
    t -= 1
